text: Staycation libur 2 tahun karena pandemi dan tahun ini akhirnya sudah bisa staycation lagi bebas tes antigen. Penginapannya baru pertama kali dengan tanggal 26 Maret 2022 ( satu malam ), ruang tunggu atau lobi cukup luas dan banyak tamu yang datang dapat minuman gratis dari resepsionisnya baik dan ramah. Kamarnya cukup luas dan bersih, dapat melihat pemandangan jalan raya dan matahari terbenam, ranjangnya besar nyaman, ada meja kursi kerja dekat televisi saluran cukup lengkap, sofa nyaman ada meja kecil juga, lemari dingin kecil bawah televisi, wifinya cukup baik dan cepat, kamar mandinya bersih dan perlengkapan mandinya cukup kecil dan lengkap. Sarapan menunya cukup banyak pilihan yang enak dan ruang makannya luas dan pelayanannya ramah. Lengkap hotelnya ada kolam renang cukup luas dan dapat pemandangan kota dan dekatnya fitnes juga. Tempat parkirnya cukup luas dan aman dan luar hotelnya ada samping tempat belanja Maspion Square dan tempat makan Hollywood Surabaya.

text: Pengalaman saya menginap di hotel ini sangatlah dikatakan luar biasa sekali. Saya menginap di hotel ini selama 2 hari 1  malam, dan saya menginap di hotel ini selama masa pandemi COvid-19. Hotel ini tentunya juga sudah menerapkan protokol COVID-19 yang sangat ketat mulai dari pengecekan suhu setiap masuk kepada para tamu, pemberian lambang social distancing di beberapa area umum seperti lobby, lift, dsbnya, selain itu pemberian sekat akrilik pada area lobby untuk memberikan kenyamanan, selain itu peletakan hand sanitizer di beberapa titik yang sering di lalui oleh orang orang seperti misalnya di lift dsbnya. Hotel ini tergolong cukup baru, sehingga memiliki desain yang sangat mewah dan elegan sekali. Hotel ini memiliki lokasi yang sangat strategis sekali yakni di jantung kota Surabaya. Saat memasuki kamar pertama kali, Kaman terasa cukup nyaman, dan desain yang dimiliki kamar ini sangatlah mewah dan elegan sekali. Kamar saya seharusnya mendapatkan akses khusus untuk menuju executive lounge, berhubung executive lounge di hotel ini masih belum jadi, sehingga afternoon tea haruslah diantar ke kamar. Menu afternoon tea sangatlah beragam sekali, mulai dari macam macam kopi, teh, variasi makanan ringan, dsbnya, dan mengenai rasa jangan perlu diragukan lagi, sangat enak sekali. Hotel ini juga memiliki fasilitas yang sangat lengkap mulai dari kolam renang, gym, dsbnya. Koneksi internet di hotel ini terasa sangat cepat, pilihan channel TV sangatlah beragam sekali. Semua staff yang ada di hotel ini sangatlah ramah sekali. Mereka selalu membantu apa yang diinginkan oleh para tamunya. Untuk variasi makanan menurut saya untuk standar hotel bintang 5, sangatlah kurang bervariasi ya, kedepan bisa ditambahkan mengenai variasi nya sehingga semakin beragam. But overall merasa puas untuk tinggal disini, dan tentunya akan kembali lagi apabila berkunjung ke Surabaya. Good Job!!
title: hotel baru di jantung kota surabaya

text:
Saya menginap disini selama 6hari karena urusan pekerjaan. Kesan saya, staff paling berkesan adalah staff area Restaurant yg bernama Mbak Grina. Luar biasa baik, ramah, helpful, dan selalu ingat akan Nama saya. Dan satu lagi staff pria resto patita yg tinggi jangkung di front desk. Tapi saya lupa namanya. Hanya saja keramahan tsb tidak merata. Sepeeti area Egg station staff nya tidak ada yg ramah. Seakan menggerutu bila saya minta dibuatkan telur. Area resepsionis juga tidak seramah hotel accor yg biasa saya menginap. Di hotel ini rame sekali terutama Area Lobby. Banyak Pramugari dan Pramugara menginap, sehingga lobby selalu ramai.

Saya agak kecewa pada gym saja. Kenapa bisa gym ditutup pukul 6? Biasa gym dibuat bebas 24jam atau setidaknya hingga pukul 9 malam. Karena bila kita baru pulang kerja malam, sudah ga bisa olahraga dong? Dan ketika saya gym di sana pagi hari, banyak tamu seminar asik ngerokok di area kolam yg berdekatan dg gym. Amat terganggu sekali dg Rokoknya. Ironis. Area berolahraga utk badan sehat, tapi pihak hotel tidak mengatur sirkulasi dan peraturan area merokok. Sehingga yg kita ingin sehat malah jadi ikutan ga sehat.

Tapi semua itu tertutup dg pelayanan staff mbak Grina yg amat ramah. Good job!

text:
Member accor platinum .
Semua hotel accor di surabaya sudah saya coba semua (Termasuk ibis budget) , termasuk hotel grand mercure yang baru ini .
Untuk lobby lumayan rapih dan bagus.
Staff semua ramah dan baik , checkin berjalan lancar dan baik. Untuk kamar bersih , rapih . Hanya saja kulkas tidak di colok listrik , jadi saya harus colok sendiri , dan bagian belakang nya kotor banyak kertas kecil seperti sobekkan teh dll .

Breakfast nya enak , Staff breakfast ramah2 dan baik .. hanya saja butuh tambahan macam2 menu biar lebih mengesan kan .

Saya dapat kamar di lantai 19 yang menghadap ke jalan raya ...Selama menginap disana , cukup terkensan buat saya , di kala mimpi saya malam hari , terkadang suka ada iklan lewat , yaitu iklan kereta api . Terkadang juga mimpi saya suka berubah tiba2 menajdi di dalam kereta api .. begitu saya bangun , ternyata kereta api lewat .. 🤣🤣🤣

Kalau boleh saran dibuatkan kedap suara lebih kedap lagi , karena type semua orng berbeda ,ada yang sensitif sama suara , ad yg tidak . Saya bisa aja minta pindah kamar, tp saya bukan orng yg terlalu rewel untuk itu .😃😬
Tapi untuk semua ok banget di grand mercure .

Next grandmercure ini bs menjadi pilihan , thankyou .

text: I stayed at the hotel during Eid holiday. The check in experience was adequate. Two rooms were ready while I had to wait for approx. 10 mins for the remaining room. Executive suite was located at the top floor. The rooms were spacious with a living room and one rest room in the living room. The walk in closet and bathroom were also spacious. I felt welcome as Accor member by their daily complimentary afternoon tea, which was fulfilling. The hotel was located close to toll road, not too close to various shopping malls to Surabaya but it was adjacent to the main road/boulevard so I think going to the various places was manageable with private vehicle. The cons were the lack of food variety during breakfast, small swimming pool and small gym facility. Yhe two treadmill were broken on my second day of stay. Tried to ask the staff for help but he left citing that he would call the engineer but in the end didn't return to the facility. Overall, I think the hotel was good for business stay, definitely not for a long stay for a gym freak.

text:
This was my first trip away from the city I lived since March 2020 when Covid-19 hit and spread worldwide in January 2020 which forced people from every corner in this world to stop doing their daily activities for months. This hotel was the base of our first 2 nights' stay (Dec. 19~21, 2020) during a 16 days' trip covering Surabaya and Bali.

I arrived in the hotel property approx. 7:30 am. At first, I couldn't park my car in the parking structure (self park area) since it was full. The concierge recommended me to go the Maspion Square next door and parked over there. After driving twice passing the main lobby area, I gave up and decided to park my car temporarily off the street right in front of the hotel.

Check-in was surprisingly prompt and efficient although I had to fill in a full page of questionnaires related to our health. After completing the check-in procedures, Mr. Yunda (the receptionist who handled my check-in) helped me finding a spot in their parking structure in 2nd Fl. 

Shortly after, we went up to our (deluxe suite) room which was located in the 20th floor (Room # 2022) which was facing the southern area of Surabaya. Our room was clean and well maintained : It was tastefully designed and the layout was carefully plan so that it gave us a feeling we were having a much bigger space in our room. 

Breakfast in the morning was truly excellent although we found limited menu but still, they were of excellent quality and good enough for all of us. Due to health reason, during our breakfast, we always selected the table in the balcony instead of  sitting inside despite the fact that it was being set up for smokers.

Overall, we had an excellent stay (much better than I expected). This hotel is located along a main road in the southern part of Surabaya. It is fairly located in between downtown area and the Juanda International Airport which makes it an ideal place to stay either for business or pleasure.

For this reason, I give them a solid 4 stars' rating (based on US Hotel standard) and I strongly recommend this property to everyone who is looking for quality hotel accommodation during their future trips to Surabaya. Good job Bu Eksi and team (two thumbs up for all of you) and I am looking forward to staying again in this hotel property in late May 2021.
title: Excellent stay in Grand Mercure Surabaya City...

text:
Good things :
- Quiete a new hotel
- Clean and luxurious interior
- Close to Juanda airport (approx. 30 min)
- Close to the toll gate (approx. 12 min)
- Close to some shopping mall (Royal, Marina, and Maspion square)
- Accor member benefit are implemented (me as a Platinum member got a free room upgrade and free evening snack, LOL)

Bad things :
- Lack of hospitality even I've stay for 3 weeks, they didn't recognize as a loyal guest.
- Very Limited parking space
- Very limited breakfast menu (maybe due to Covid situation). And then amazingly they don't provide cereal for a breakfast (even a motel always had a cereal for breakfast, come on guys, seriously?)
- Need to call the housekeeping to get my laundry. I've told them many times to always bring my laundry after it's finished, but they never did.
- You will got a special treatment if you are a flight attendant. (I'm just a normal person who need some place to stay, so I'm not special for them even though I spend 3 weeks stays there)
- Somehow to many RESERVED board everywhere (I don't know who reserved so many table everywhere and everytime, still become mysterious for me, LOL)
title: First Impression for staying 3 weeks

The hotel is brand new.  It meets expectation since the time we arrived: fast and friendly check in, prompt uggages delivery to the room, very clean brand new room.

The one that stood out was the room service's local cuisine.  It exceeded our expectation.   It is definitely not typical five stars hotel local dishes that tend to lose the local taste.  The foods were great.   Mie Goreng Klinthung was fresh and savory.  Lontong Kikil (depite was out of rice cake when we ordered) was delicious till the last drop.
title: The room service's local dishes are not  five stars  -  in a good way
